price: A yinin nan cẽto bã ya yin amfãni fãce wanda Mai rahama Ya yi masa izni kuma Ya yarda da shi, da ya yi magana*
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا
footnotes: * Bãbu ceto ga kõwa sai wanda Allah Mai rahama Ya yi masa iznin da yin ceton, ga wanda aka yi iznin sabõda shi, kuma izni anã yin sa ne da maganar Allah, ba da wata ishãra ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin lā tanfaʿu al-shafāʿatu illā man adhina lahu al-raḥmānu waraḍiya lahu qawlan
